item.title: Bit operation in C++
item.description: Bit operator operator function example « left shift 0001 –> 0010 » right shift 0010 –> 0001 & and (bit by bit) 1100 & 1010 = 1000 | or (bit by bit) 1010 | 0101 = 1111 ~ reverse ~0000 = 1111 ^ XOR 0110 ^ 1100 = 1010 Operator: & x is a bit
